mapper.insert: INSERT INTO badges ( badge_no , badge_name , badge_img, act_count, grade , badge_detail , status) VALUES ( SEQ_BADGES_BADGE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{badgeName} , #{badgeImg:VARCHAR}, 0 , 0, #{badgeDetail:VARCHAR} , #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT badge_no , badge_name , badge_img , act_count , grade , badge_detail , status FROM badges WHERE badge_no = #{value}
